posts.post_content:
Two T205 cards for sale:

Mathewson Piedmont Factory 25- Sold
Gardner Piedmont Factory 25- [strike]$40[/strike]$30/ offer

Prices include shipping. All prices net to me.  PP, check, MO.  If personal check, card will ship when check clears.  Will consider trades from other sets, like T206, T211, T215, T216, E99/100, early Zeenut (1911, 1912, 1913), or ?.  Not looking for more T205s.  Thanks for looking.

PM or e-mail at [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL]

Thanks for the Mathewson sale, love that card!
-Ed
